actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research

official_title: To make Celina, Ohio, eligible for certain rural development loans and grants.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Considers Celina, Ohio, to be an eligible rural area (until the city's population exceeds 150% of the greatest population an area could have and, in the absence of this section, still be considered an eligible rural area) under the following Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act programs: (1) water and waste facility loans and grants; (2) emergency and imminent community water assistance grants; and (3) the rural community advancement program.

titles.title: To make Celina, Ohio, eligible for certain rural development loans and grants.
